name: 6EAN 2
description:
Use A, D, and Space bar to move and jump.

-----

Maneuver your bean boi to save Earth from space junk! Save the beans!

"This game is bean-nanas" - Maddie Bean

"This game saved my marriage" - Justin Bean

"I failed all my classes just to play this game" - Paeton Pean

"There is no happiness, there is only beans" - Nate OlvBean

"Uhhhhhh, why?" - Megan Beanson

"The bean is infinite, the bean is all" - Charlie Beanman

"Surrender everything to the bean" - Lydia Beans

"Just let me play Skyrim. Leave me alone" - Danny Not Beanman

"Oh" - Zach Beanings

"There are beans in this game" - Matt Beanton
